subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Accidents and Safety
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Descents, slick roads and sprints to the finish are dangers at up to 70 m.p.h. for cyclists who take to the roads in good weather and bad.
snippet: Descents, slick roads and sprints to the finish are dangers at up to 70 m.p.h. for cyclists who take to the roads in good weather and bad.
